verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell in <S%H3427><s%>; and ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> also unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for the cities <S%H5892><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them.

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall they have to dwell in <S%H3427><s%>; and the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of them shall be for their cattle <S%H929><s%>, and for their goods <S%H7399><s%>, and for all their beasts <S%H2416><s%>.

And the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%>, which ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, shall reach from the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> and outward <S%H2351><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And ye shall measure <S%H4058><s%> from without <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%>: this shall be to them the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And among the cities <S%H5892><s%> which ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> there shall be six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for refuge <S%H4733><s%>, which ye shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, that he may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither: and to them ye shall add <S%H5414><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

So all the cities <S%H5892><s%> which ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be forty <S%H705><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>: them shall ye give with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> which ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> shall be of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: from them that have many <S%H7227><s%> ye shall give many <S%H7235><s%>; but from them that have few <S%H4592><s%> ye shall give few <S%H4591><s%>: every one <S%H376><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> of his cities <S%H5892><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which he inheriteth <S%H5157><s%>.
Â¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, When ye be come over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>;

Then ye shall appoint <S%H7136><s%> you cities <S%H5892><s%> to be cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for you; that the slayer <S%H7523><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither, which killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> at unawares <S%H7684><s%>.

And they shall be unto you cities <S%H5892><s%> for refuge <S%H4733><s%> from the avenger <S%H1350><s%>; that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> not, until he stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
And of these cities <S%H5892><s%> which ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall ye have for refuge <S%H4733><s%>.

Ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, which shall be cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%>.

These six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be a refuge <S%H4733><s%>, both for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, and for the sojourner <S%H8453><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: that every one that killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unawares <S%H7684><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither.

And if he smite <S%H5221><s%> him with an instrument <S%H3627><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>, so that he die <S%H4191><s%>, he is a murderer <S%H7523><s%>: the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And if he smite <S%H5221><s%> him with throwing <S%H3027><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%>, wherewith he may die <S%H4191><s%>, and he die <S%H4191><s%>, he is a murderer <S%H7523><s%>: the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

Or if he smite <S%H5221><s%> him with an hand <S%H3027><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>, wherewith he may die <S%H4191><s%>, and he die <S%H4191><s%>, he is a murderer <S%H7523><s%>: the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.
The revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> himself shall slay <S%H4191><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%>: when he meeteth <S%H6293><s%> him, he <S%H1931><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> him.
But if he thrust <S%H1920><s%> him of hatred <S%H8135><s%>, or hurl <S%H7993><s%> at him by laying of wait <S%H6660><s%>, that he die <S%H4191><s%>;

Or in enmity <S%H342><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> him with his hand <S%H3027><s%>, that he die <S%H4191><s%>: he that smote <S%H5221><s%> him shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>; for he is a murderer <S%H7523><s%>: the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%>, when he meeteth <S%H6293><s%> him.
But if he thrust <S%H1920><s%> him suddenly <S%H6621><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> enmity <S%H342><s%>, or have cast <S%H7993><s%> upon him any thing <S%H3627><s%> without laying of wait <S%H6660><s%>,

Or with any stone <S%H68><s%>, wherewith a man may die <S%H4191><s%>, seeing <S%H7200><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%>, and cast <S%H5307><s%> it upon him, that he die <S%H4191><s%>, and was not his enemy <S%H341><s%>, neither sought <S%H1245><s%> his harm <S%H7451><s%>:
Then the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall judge <S%H8199><s%> between the slayer <S%H5221><s%> and the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> according to these judgments <S%H4941><s%>:

And the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall restore <S%H7725><s%> him to the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge <S%H4733><s%>, whither he was fled <S%H5127><s%>: and he shall abide <S%H3427><s%> in it unto the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, which was anointed <S%H4886><s%> with the holy <S%H6944><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.

But if the slayer <S%H7523><s%> shall at any time <S%H3318><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> without the border <S%H1366><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge <S%H4733><s%>, whither he was fled <S%H5127><s%>;

And the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> him without <S%H2351><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge <S%H4733><s%>, and the revenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> kill <S%H7523><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%>; he shall not be guilty of blood <S%H1818><s%>:

Because he should have remained <S%H3427><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge <S%H4733><s%> until the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>: but after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession <S%H272><s%>.
So these things shall be for a statute <S%H2708><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%> unto you throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

Whoso killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%>, the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall be put to death <S%H7523><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of witnesses <S%H5707><s%>: but one <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not testify <S%H6030><s%> against any person <S%H5315><s%> to cause him to die <S%H4191><s%>.

Moreover ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> no satisfaction <S%H3724><s%> for the life <S%H5315><s%> of a murderer <S%H7523><s%>, which is guilty <S%H7563><s%> of death <S%H4191><s%>: but he shall be surely <S%H4191><s%> put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> no satisfaction <S%H3724><s%> for him that is fled <S%H5127><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of his refuge <S%H4733><s%>, that he should come again <S%H7725><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, until the death <S%H4194><s%> of the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

So ye shall not pollute <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein ye are: for blood <S%H1818><s%> it defileth <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: and the land <S%H776><s%> cannot be cleansed <S%H3722><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is shed <S%H8210><s%> therein, but by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of him that shed <S%H8210><s%> it.

Defile <S%H2930><s%> not therefore the land <S%H776><s%> which ye shall inhabit <S%H3427><s%>, wherein <S%H8432><s%> I dwell <S%H7931><s%>: for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
